PATIENT_ID: TEST_GERIATRIC_HIP_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-14 18:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-14 18:10:00
Category II activation for 75-year-old female. Ground-level fall.
Age 75. Left hip tenderness. Unable to bear weight.
BP 150/88, HR 80, RR 16, GCS 15.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-14 18:30:00
AP pelvis x-ray: suspected left hip fracture. Trochanteric fracture possible.
Image quality suboptimal. Fracture type not definitively characterized.
Hip fracture not confirmed definitively.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-14 19:00:00
Possible left hip fracture on x-ray but imaging inconclusive.
No CT obtained for clarification.
No orthopedic consultation obtained yet.
No operative plan documented.
Pending additional imaging and consultation.
